titleStmt.title: A godlye and fruitefull sermon against idolatrie vvherein the foolishe distinctions and false interpretations of the seconde commandement, and other scriptures pretended by the Papists, are plainly and fully confuted: preached the .xv. daye of Ianuarie. 1581. in the parrishe church of Eaton Sooken, within the countie of Bedforde, by P.W. minister and preacher in that place.
titleStmt.author: White, Peter, Vicar of Eaton Socon.

notesStmt.note: Imprint varies: "by" (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) or "for" (Harvard University. Library copy) F. Coldocke--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
